document_data.title: Volatile Thoughts
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Volatile Thoughts''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Plague of Ancients|Plague of Ancients]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Icewind Dale]], and is an adventure designed for 5{{th}} to 10{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''Just when you thought Realmspace-faring slavers were the worst thing that could cross your path, it quickly became apparent you were wrong—terrible things lurk in the depths of the long-dead Abeiran city of Xorvintroth. And when faces with countless, unfathomable horrors infesting an ancient city of a long-dead civilization from another world there's one solution...explosives.''|}}
